alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 02 at 9:05AM CST until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Edinburg. * WHEN...From late Saturday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding is occurring south of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Thursday the stage was 18.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage early Sunday afternoon and crest at 20.5 feet on Monday. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 18.7 Thu 7 am CST 19.9 19.7 20.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CST.
